mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Fourth Year Class, 1948-1949
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Front row(l to r): Allan Leroy Armstrong, Lundie Weathers Barlow, Jr., Francis Elwood Barrett, Spencer Pippen Bass, Jr., Eugene Russell Bebeau, William Upson Cawthon, John Bayard Britton, Thomas Alfred Cook, Jr., Robert Vincent Crowder, Jr., James Lovern Deadwyler, Patrick Salvatore Ferazzi, Donald Hugh Ferguson, Edward Halsell Fite, Jr., Robert Emery Gould. Second row(l to r): Cambell Harris, Jr., James Edward Henney, Frank Imboden Hobbs, Ammon Walter Hoover, Leon Edward Kassell, Thomas Allen Kirk, Jr., Trent Laviano, William Edgar Lawton, Jr., Miriam Lending, Ira Claire Liebrand, Bridger Pearl Little, Jr., David Craig Lucas, Robert Arthur Marks, Walter Ramon McCook, Eugene Sheldon Mendelsohn. Third row(l to r): Joseph Allan Offen, Donald Robert Pierce, Michael Potter, Harry Wampole Reinstine, Jr., Albert Vinson Rigsbee, John Alden Rogness, John Chrysotom Rourke, John Henry Russell, Harvey Daniel Smallwood, William Meurice Snook, Martin Herman Sternstein, Francis Simon Sullivan, Josephine Young Sullivan, David Alan Mullon, Robert Ludwig Sundre. Fourth row(l to r): Charles Franklin Tate, Harry Baylor Taylor, Jr., Marvin Thalenberg, Douglas James Thompson, George Edward Traschel, John Marshall Vivian, Harry Gordon Walker, Donald Leslie Weeks, Jr., Henry Harrison Wilson, Jr., Harold Ray Yarbro.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
